rules_text: Exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls. That player creates a 4/4 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 1.
flavor_text: [i]“She's the finest thing I've ever crafted. As long as she floats, call me part of her crew. I will go down with this ship.”[/i]
notes:
WU:
 - Five or more artifacts
 - Metalcraft
GW:

 - +1/+1 counters

 - flicker

 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
